name: nestjs-example
description: Acerta Analytics Nest.js based Repo should use this as template

scripts.test: if [ -z "$ENV_KEY" ]; then eval $(awk '!/^#/{print "export " $0}' test/test.env); fi && npm run typeorm -- schema:drop && jest --runInBand
scripts.test:unit: if [ -z "$ENV_KEY" ]; then eval $(awk '!/^#/{print "export " $0}' test/test.env); fi && jest --testRegex ".*\.spec\.ts" --runInBand
scripts.test:service: if [ -z "$ENV_KEY" ]; then eval $(awk '!/^#/{print "export " $0}' test/test.env); fi && npm run typeorm -- schema:drop && jest --testRegex ".*\.svc-spec.ts" --runInBand
scripts.test:ci: rimraf test-reports && eval $(awk '!/^#/{print "export " $0}' test/test.env) && JEST_JUNIT_OUTPUT_DIR=test-reports jest --ci --reporters=default --reporters=jest-junit --coverageDirectory=test-reports/coverage --runInBand
scripts.start: if [ -z "$ENV_KEY" ]; then eval $(awk '!/^#/{print "export " $0}' .env); fi && nest start
scripts.typeorm: if [ -z "$ENV_KEY" ]; then eval $(awk '!/^#/{print "export " $0}' test/test.env); fi && typeorm-ts-node-commonjs -d ormconfig.ts
